segments.text: May I see your ticket and passport , PLS ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your backpack is very big and today's flight is quite full . I am afraid that you will have to check your backpack too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . What about this carry-on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can take that with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have an aisle seat , PLS .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'll give you an aisle seat in the center row . And here is your ticket , passport and boarding pass . Please board the plane at Gate 15 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . And when is the latest time for me to board the plane ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 15mins before the plane takes off . The plane is scheduled to leave on time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome ! Have a nice flight .
segments.speaker: S1
